body:
Comment 9 by **vendion**: 
After running those I don't see a difference from before:

╭─vendion@Big-O ~  
╰─➤  unset GOROOT
╭─vendion@Big-O ~  
╰─➤  unset GOOS
╭─vendion@Big-O ~  
╰─➤  unset GOARCH
╭─vendion@Big-O ~  
╰─➤  unset GOROOT_FINAL
╭─vendion@Big-O ~  
╰─➤  /opt/go/bin/go env
GOROOT="/opt/go"
GOBIN=""
GOARCH="amd64"
GOCHAR="6"
GOOS="linux"
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="linux"
GOTOOLDIR="/opt/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64"
GOGCCFLAGS="-g -O2 -fPIC -m64 -pthread"
CGO_ENABLED="1"
╭─vendion@Big-O ~ 
╰─➤  echo $GOROOT


Just to make sure that unset did work I echod $GOROOT and it came back blank.  That says
that the GOROOT is set correctly but if anything panics or if I run GDB they keep
looking under /usr/local/go.
